,Schol. Lore (Imp Creed), Weapon Training (Flame). 
Apt: Ballistic Skill, Offence
system.descriptionText: Character can use Order whenever an enemy is on fire within 10 metres of a Comrade in Cohesion. Until Character's next turn, enemy has -20 to any tests to extinguish flames and suffers +1d5 Damage from effects with the Flame Quality.
